name: B. Turn the Rectangles
statement:
There are n rectangles in a row. You can either turn each rectangle by
90 degrees or leave it as it is. If you turn a rectangle, its width will
be height, and its height will be width. Notice that you can turn any
number of rectangles, you also can turn all or none of them. Find out if
there is a way to make the rectangles go in order of non-ascending
height. In other words, after all the turns, a height of every rectangle
has to be not greater than the height of the previous rectangle (if it
is such).
